Description: Value and volume metrics list: EU (MNF)/ EU (PUB)/ Price (MNF)/ Price (PUB)/ RX/ TD/ IU/ Iut/ LC/ SU/ Pack / UN/ Peq

Value and volume metrics description: Average price (Manufacturer)/ Average price (Public)/ International Units/ Local currency/ Pack Units/ Patient equivalent/ Prescription/ Standart Units/ Treatments days/ Turnover (Manufacturer)/ Turnover (Public price)/ Units
To work specifically on a specific period (a year, a quarter or a month)
To select specifically a number of months
To select specifically a month, a quarter or a year
Month : latest month of data received by the country (for the selected metric)
Note: Level of aggregation on a period

Description: Rolling quarter : last 3 months of data (for the selected metric)
Rolling 6 months : last 6 months of data (for the selected metric)
Moving annual total : last 12 months data for the selected metric
Year to date : Period beginning the first month of the current calendar up to the latest month data
Data on a specific month (January 2018, February 2018)
Note: To compare a period to another

Description: Data on the month of the past year (IF Month IS January 2018, Month Y-1 IS January 2017)
Delta between data of the month and data of the month of the past year Calculation = (Month) - (Month Y-1)
Evolution vs past year Calculation = (Month) / (Month Y-1) - 1
Value of the market (selection based on filtered applied on the "Market" dimension)
Value of the market of last year (selection based on filtered applied on the "Market" dimension)
Market Delta between data of the month and data of the month of the past year Calculation = (Month) - (Month Y-1)
Market Evolution vs past year Calculation = (Month) / (Month Y-1) - 1
A percentage of total sales in a market captured by a brand, product, or company for the selected metric
Calculation = (Growth Y-1) - (Market Growth Y-1)
Calculation = (MS) - (MS Y-1)
To select to work on a specific period (last month, last 13 months, last 25 months ,etc.)
Data on last period in commun that we received from countries in the scope
Note: To work on aligned period or latest period

Description: Data on last period of each country received

Sub-Group/ Item: Area/ BU/ Cluster/ Country/ Region/ Zone
Description: To select to work on specific area (emerging or mature), BU, cluster, country, region or zone
Conversion rate to Euro
Availability in Flashcard
Last intermediary between Manufacturer and the final user: where the patient get the product, e.g.; Retail, Hospital
Grouping of the channels into Mix, Retail and Non-retail group
Data sources containing different markets in the same country (For example, Germany sends 4 panels such as hospital, retail, pharma scope and CHC panel)
Contains the names of different panels
Type of volume unit : CU, CUST, EXTU, PACK, SU, ZE
Data on last period of each country received
To select to split by OTC or ATC
Monthly or Quarterly or Weekly data
Sanofi Market description: 6 levels of categories (Category 0 is the more granular) , detailed in 'Market Definition' of the question marks
Sanofi Market description: 6 levels of categories (Category 0 is the more granular) , detailed in 'Market Definition' of the question marks
Data available (or not) in Flashcard
Data available (or not) in Flashcube
Data available (or not) in transcode
Sanofi Market description: 6 levels of categories (Category 0 is the more granular) , detailed in 'Market Definition' of the question marks
Sanofi Market description: 6 levels of categories (Category 0 is the more granular) , detailed in 'Market Definition' of the question marks
Level of granularity specific to a category according to business needs
Recoded ATC4 data to have the correct 4 digit values or codes
The raw data for ATC4 we receive from DS without any modification
Industry standard code (New Form Code) for administration of the drug and to calculate the standard units
The raw data for NFC123 we receive from DS without any modification
Level of granularity specific to a category according to business needs
International corporations cleaned, mapped and regrouped
The corporation raw data that we receive from DS without any modification
International corporations cleaned, mapped and regrouped

Split on specific Multinational Corporations (MNC) or others Multinational Corporations (Others MNCs) For example, at a global level, the list of MNCs includes mainly Astrazeneca, Bristol-Myers SQB, Glaxosmithkline, Johnson & Johnson, Lilly, Merck & Co, Merck KGAA, Novartis, Pfizer, Sanofi At a global level, the list of Others MNCs includes mainly Aspen, Bayer, Mylan, Takeda, etc.
Not used
Manufacturer names
Date of launch of the product (based on the first period of sales in Sinergi if not defined by DS)
Patient equivalent : To compare products within the same market independently of indication, dosage, treatment regimen, compliance (Kevzara market)

Classification according to the IMS definition of a parallel Import/non parallel import (PI or no PI status) products. For example, Germany imports drugs from others countries, then this products will be marked as PI
Rhumatoid arthritis factor : Split by indication. When a product has several indications / claims, we apply a coefficient in order to estimate the % of sales specific to the indications monitored
International Unit : Conversion of volumes of diabetes injectables products in a common unit in order to compare basal, rapid & premix products head to head.
International Unit Equivalent : Metric to monitor GLP1 and FRC (fix ratio combination) to compare them to other injectable diabetes products
Milligram of product
Milliliter of product
Pack Units - Similar to the number of pads in one box For example, '30 pills 20 Mg' contains one 30 pill pack whereas '30 pills 2 20 Mg' means 2 pads of 30 pills each in the same box
The raw data for Pack Units that we receive from DS without any modification
Product_recode + Pack_recode
Product + Pack (raw data)

Standard Units (volume unit): The number of standard �dose� units sold. It is determined by taking the number of counting units sold divided by the standard unit factor which is the smallest common dose of a product form as defined by IMS HEALTH
Treatment days : Number of Days of Treatment to compare products within the same market independently of dosage and treatment regimen (APA wo ASA market, LLT market, Prostate cancer)
Unit type depending on the data provider in countries
Manufacturer price rate : conversion from local price level to Manufacturer Selling Price or Wholesaler Purchasing Price or Price to Wholesaler (PTW)
PADDS price rate
Public price rate : conversion from local price level to Pharmacy Selling Price or Consumer Purchase Price or Price to the Public (PTP)
Trade price rate : conversion from local price level to Wholesaler Selling Price or Pharmacy Purchase Price or Price to Chemist (PTC)
Molecule of the product, harmonized after reception of raw data
The raw data for molecule we receive from DS without any modification
Name of product, harmonized after reception of local data
The raw data for product we receive from DS without any modification
Product brand
Product grouping defined by the name of the product or the generic. This dimension can be used if products have different names in the countries or if several products exist
Product grouping defined by the name of the family brand or the name of the product or the generic
Product grouping defined by the name of the molecule
RX or Non-RX after recoding
RX or Non-RX or Others (raw data)
